name: oh shit i'm dreaming again.
description:
Controls: Use the arrow keys to move and space bar to interact.

You wake up and... eventually... you wake up again.

A surreal adventure game about being stuck in a looping dream that never ends. Developed by Smarto Club for Ludum Dare 47. https://twitter.com/smarto_club
